Name: before
Desc: Inserts content before each element in the current set of matched elements.
Long Desc: Inserts content before each element in the current set of matched elements. Accepts a string for HTML, an HTMLElement, a Q object, an array of elements, or a NodeList. Strings are added as raw HTML, while elements and objects are inserted before the target nodes.
Example:
Q(selector).before("

New paragraph

"); // Adds a paragraph as HTML Q(selector).before(document.createElement("div")); // Adds a div element Q(selector).before(Q(otherSelector)); // Inserts a Q object Q(selector).before([document.createElement("span"), document.createElement("img")]); // Inserts multiple elements
